evidence.text: ORDER APPROVING SETTLEMENT: This matter came before the Court on the parties' Stipulated Motion for Order Approving Settlement Agreement 154. ... IT IS ORDERED that, pursuant to LR 41-1, this action is dismissed with prejudice and without costs, and with leave, upon good cause shown within sixty (60) days, to have this order of dismissal set aside and the action reinstated if the settlement is not consummated.

extracted.value: 2024-10-07: Settlement approved by Court per Order 157

evidence.source_document: Third Amended Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs seek prospective injunctive and declaratory relief pursuant to 42 USC § 1983. Plaintiffs ask this court to enjoin defendant from taking law enforcement action against plaintiffs for sleeping or simply existing in Grants Pass unless and until the City provides a lawful place for people to rest, sleep and find shelter.
with leave, upon good cause shown within sixty (60) days, to have this order of dismissal set aside and the action reinstated if the settlement is not consummated.

extracted.value: 60 days: settlement not consummated within 60 days

evidence.text: the Court having been informed by counsel for the parties that this action has been settled, IT IS ORDERED that, pursuant to LR 41-1, this action is dismissed with prejudice and without costs, and with leave, upon good cause shown within sixty (60) days, to have this order of dismissal set aside and the action reinstated if the settlement is not consummated.

extracted.value: Dismissal with prejudice unless settlement consummated within 60 days

evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that, pursuant to LR 41-1, this action is dismissed with prejudice and without costs, and with leave, upon good cause shown within sixty (60) days, to have this order of dismissal set aside and the action reinstated if the settlement is not consummated.
